emails.subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing
emails.body_text:
Thanks Saber

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 
Sent: Thursday, 04 December 2025 17:48
To: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hello Nic,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

The discrepancies in the Value Period for the crop-production item have now been amended. Please let us know if everything appears correct on your end as well.

For your second point, we will review this internally with the team and keep you updated.

 

Kind regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com <mailto:nic@polarstarfunds.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, December 2, 2025 14:02
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> >
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Thanks Saber, please also note that there are missing names for many of the items as well:

 



 

Regards

Nic

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Tuesday, 02 December 2025 11:52
To: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com <mailto:nic@polarstarfunds.com> >; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> >
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hello Nic,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Thanks for reaching out and for flagging this. 

 

We’re reviewing the issue internally and will get back to you as soon as possible with an update.

 

Kind regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com <mailto:nic@polarstarfunds.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, December 2, 2025 10:12
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> >
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Saber and Guillaume

 

Hope you’re doing well. Just replying to this email as it was our last communication. 

 

In the Corn SND dataset, it seems some monthly forecasts are actually annual ones. Below are examples for Arg and Brazil production. If I filter out the forecasts and only use the ‘calculations’ then I’ll be missing a lot of future data points so it’s quite difficult to automate our use of the data in our own SNDs.

 



 

Here for Brazil the forecasts/calculations alternate, both of which state a monthly value period but obviously the one is not. They also fall on the same publication date so when constructing the historical SNDs, it becomes a question of which to use – the process of automating this over all countries/commodities for all the datasets we have access to becomes very difficult. 

 



 

Regards

Nic

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Monday, 07 July 2025 18:15
To: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com <mailto:nic@polarstarfunds.com> >; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> >
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hello Nic,

 

We are glad to inform you that the issue has been resolved and you should be able find the DNEXR Corn SND dataset on the platform now with the same code as before.

 



 

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and we thank you for your patience and understanding.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com <mailto:nic@polarstarfunds.com> > 
Sent: Monday, July 7, 2025 7:38
To: Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io <mailto:guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> >
Cc: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >
Subject: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Guillaume and Saber

 

It seems the DNEXR Corn SND dataset is no longer available on the platform or through the API (the code was “polarstar-c4ffcc58-c9b0-4935-a0c8-b93f28d7d674”). The SND datasets for other commodities are still available though. Could you please assist, thanks.

 

Regards

Nic

 

Disclaimer

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, 02 December 2025 11:52

Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hello Nic,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Thanks for reaching out and for flagging this.

 

We’re reviewing the issue internally and will get back to you as soon as possible with an update.

 

Kind regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 2, 2025 10:12
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Saber and Guillaume

 

Hope you’re doing well. Just replying to this email as it was our last communication.

 

In the Corn SND dataset, it seems some monthly forecasts are actually annual ones. Below are examples for Arg and Brazil production. If I filter out the forecasts and only use the ‘calculations’ then I’ll be missing a lot of future data points so it’s quite difficult to automate our use of the data in our own SNDs.

 

 

Here for Brazil the forecasts/calculations alternate, both of which state a monthly value period but obviously the one is not. They also fall on the same publication date so when constructing the historical SNDs, it becomes a question of which to use – the process of automating this over all countries/commodities for all the datasets we have access to becomes very difficult.

 

 

Regards

Nic

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Monday, 07 July 2025 18:15
To: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hello Nic,

 

We are glad to inform you that the issue has been resolved and you should be able find the DNEXR Corn SND dataset on the platform now with the same code as before.

 

 

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and we thank you for your patience and understanding.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

Cc: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Subject: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Guillaume and Saber

 

It seems the DNEXR Corn SND dataset is no longer available on the platform or through the API (the code was “polarstar-c4ffcc58-c9b0-4935-a0c8-b93f28d7d674”). The SND datasets for other commodities are still available though. Could you please assist, thanks.

 

Regards

Nic

Thanks for reaching out and for flagging this.

 

We’re reviewing the issue internally and will get back to you as soon as possible with an update.

 

Kind regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Saber and Guillaume

 

Hope you’re doing well. Just replying to this email as it was our last communication.

 

In the Corn SND dataset, it seems some monthly forecasts are actually annual ones. Below are examples for Arg and Brazil production. If I filter out the forecasts and only use the ‘calculations’ then I’ll be missing a lot of future data points so it’s quite difficult to automate our use of the data in our own SNDs.

 

 

Here for Brazil the forecasts/calculations alternate, both of which state a monthly value period but obviously the one is not. They also fall on the same publication date so when constructing the historical SNDs, it becomes a question of which to use – the process of automating this over all countries/commodities for all the datasets we have access to becomes very difficult.

 

 

Regards

Nic

Hello Nic,

 

We are glad to inform you that the issue has been resolved and you should be able find the DNEXR Corn SND dataset on the platform now with the same code as before.

 

 

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and we thank you for your patience and understanding.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Subject: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Guillaume and Saber

 

It seems the DNEXR Corn SND dataset is no longer available on the platform or through the API (the code was “polarstar-c4ffcc58-c9b0-4935-a0c8-b93f28d7d674”). The SND datasets for other commodities are still available though. Could you please assist, thanks.

 

Regards

Nic

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, 02 December 2025 11:52
To: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>

Hello Nic,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Thanks for reaching out and for flagging this.

 

We’re reviewing the issue internally and will get back to you as soon as possible with an update.

 

Kind regards,

Saber Khalfallah

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 2, 2025 10:12
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hi Saber and Guillaume

 

Hope you’re doing well. Just replying to this email as it was our last communication.

 

In the Corn SND dataset, it seems some monthly forecasts are actually annual ones. Below are examples for Arg and Brazil production. If I filter out the forecasts and only use the ‘calculations’ then I’ll be missing a lot of future data points so it’s quite difficult to automate our use of the data in our own SNDs.

 

 

Here for Brazil the forecasts/calculations alternate, both of which state a monthly value period but obviously the one is not. They also fall on the same publication date so when constructing the historical SNDs, it becomes a question of which to use – the process of automating this over all countries/commodities for all the datasets we have access to becomes very difficult.

 

 

Regards

Nic

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Monday, 07 July 2025 18:15
To: Nic Mitoulis <nic@polarstarfunds.com>; Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXR Corn SND dataset missing

 

Hello Nic,

 

We are glad to inform you that the issue has been resolved and you should be able find the DNEXR Corn SND dataset on the platform now with the same code as before.

 

 

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and we thank you for your patience and understanding.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

It seems the DNEXR Corn SND dataset is no longer available on the platform or through the API (the code was “polarstar-c4ffcc58-c9b0-4935-a0c8-b93f28d7d674”). The SND datasets for other commodities are still available though. Could you please assist, thanks.

 

Regards

Nic
